<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106990</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106990</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206273</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">EPA Student Center</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EPA Kursteilnehmer-Mitte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre D'Étudiant d'EPA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro Do Estudante de EPA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro Dell'Allievo di EPA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κέντρο σπουδαστών EPA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro Del Estudiante de EPA</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">contains dozens of environmental science resources for students as well as online reference materials.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">enthält Dutzende der Klimawissenschaft 
Betriebsmittel für Kursteilnehmer sowie Onlinebezugsmaterialien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">contient des douzaines de ressources 
environnementales de la science pour des étudiants aussi bien que les
documentations de référence en ligne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contem dúzias de recursos ambientais da ciência 
para estudantes as.well.as materiais de referência em linha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">contiene le dozzine delle risorse ambientali di 
scienza per gli allievi così come i materiali di riferimento in 
linea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιέχει τις δωδεκάδες των περιβαλλοντικών στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς επιστήμης για τους σπουδαστές καθώς επίσης και τα σε
απευθείας σύνδεση υλικά αναφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">contiene docenas de recursos ambientales de la 
ciencia para los estudiantes así como los materiales de referencia en
línea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206273</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>

    <name>

    <item>

</expression>
